description:
DJRecruit Asia

With its headquarters in Hong Kong, DJRecruit Asia operates with professional teams in both Hong Kong and Vietnam, overseeing recruitment efforts in Vietnam and across the broader APAC region. Established in 2008 by a team of accomplished international recruitment professionals from the United Kingdom, our expertise spans the markets we serve.

About our client

Under the CHINT Group, our client is an intelligent manufacturing enterprise focusing on photovoltaic modules. Founded in 2006, they were among the earliest private enterprises to enter the PV field. Their business spans over 140 countries and regions worldwide. They are committed to becoming the most competitive photovoltaic module supplier globally, with a mission to create a sustainable and net-zero carbon world through solar power. They focuse on the research and development, production, and sales of high-efficiency crystalline silicon PV cells and PV modules. They have consistently introduced the ASTRO series high-efficiency modules, enabled by big-size wafer technology. This technology allows both bifacial and monofacial ASTRO series modules to be effectively utilized in various scenarios, including utility-scale power stations, commercial and industrial (C&I) PV systems, and residential PV systems.

Responsibilities
• Champion their product brand & make a great influence through dynamic approaches.
• Assist team leader with all operational - mainly client-related matters - in assigned regions.
• Establish and maintain current clients and potential client relationships.
• Actively generate sales leads in the assigned territory/with assigned clients, develop new business, and identify areas of improvement.
• Implement their sales plan and achieve revenue targets.
• Within established parameters, prepare quotations and negotiate sales contracts with the assigned customer base and potential new customers.
• Work closely and communicate effectively with different Departments in both headquarters in China and other Overseas entities.
• Represent them at trade fairs and conferences.
• Analyze market competitor info and stay updated with technical and financial market requirements.
• Maintain sales pipeline in the CRM system.
• Prepare reports on account status.
• Organize and execute marketing campaigns together with our clients.

Requirements
• Minimum 3 years of sales experience in a PV module company specifically, preferably more.
• Very strong utility-scale pipeline and experience.
• Attention to detail.
• Demonstrable ability to communicate, present, and influence key stakeholders at utilities, IPPs, EPCs, project developers, and financing institutions.
• Proficient in utilizing channel sales resources and having personal or customer resources is preferred, and candidates with experience in photovoltaic modules, inverters, and power plants are preferred. Experience in project sales, channel sales, and key account sales is preferred.
• Solid experience with MS Office and CRM.
• Excellent analytical, listening, negotiation, and presentation abilities.
• Strong verbal and written communication skills.
• Fluent in English; other languages a plus.
• The role will be home-based. Domestic or cross-regional travelling may be required.

What they offer
• A role in a quick-growing and very successful international organization.
• A role in which you can show your expertise, know-how, and entrepreneurship.
• An international work environment.
• Training and development opportunities.

Please forward your CV or any enquiries to harvey.pham@djrecruit.com or +84 934819563
